segments.text: I can't believe my eyes— the sink is literally overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascading down like a waterfall in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman hasn't noticed; she's just drying that plate calmly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's wet, but she keeps going as if nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, turning to the left, there's a boy on a stool reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's open, and he's pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it's tipping—oh no!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping by holding her hand up for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so sneaky, with mom right there unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is serene; what a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly, but water's heading their way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene popped up out of nowhere—total chaos hidden in plain sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never expected to see kids raiding cookies amid a flood.
segments.speaker: PAR
